Class SnsPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.umeng.socialize.bean.SnsPlatform
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomPlatform

    public abstract class SnsPlatform
extends Object
    SDK社交平台基类，SNS平台自身内部数据封装类
